PHRASE.LANG: Chaqueta de Chuck de Dead Rising 2
The zombie outbreak has hit Fortune City! Increase your chances of survival by wearing the iconic jacket of former Motocross champion and new protagonist of Dead Rising 2, Chuck Greene. [#Legal]

L'épidémie de zombies a frappé Fortune City ! Augmentez vos chances de survie en portant la veste symbolique de l'ancien champion de motocross et nouveau protagoniste de Dead Rising 2, Chuck Greene. [#Legal]
Die Zombieseuche hat Fortune City erreicht! Verbessere deine Überlebenschancen mit der berühmten Jacke des ehemaligen Motocross-Champions und Protagonisten aus Dead Rising 2, Chuck Greene. [#Legal]
Gli zombie hanno invaso Fortune City! Aumenta le tue chance di sopravvivenza indossando la mitica giacca di Chuck, ex campione di motocross, nonché inedito protagonista di Dead Rising 2. [#Legal]

¡La oleada de zombies ha llegado a Fortune City! Aumenta tus probabilidades de supervivencia poniéndote la icónica chaqueta del antiguo campeón de motocross y nuevo protagonista de Dead Rising 2, Chuck Greene. [#Legal]
The zombie outbreak has hit Fortune City! Increase your chances of survival by wearing the iconic jacket of former Motocross champion and new protagonist of Dead Rising 2, Chuck Greene. [#Legal]
